format: JavaScript (JSX-like syntax with Lightning JS components)
description: This file defines a 'NotesList' UI component using the Lightning JS framework. It renders a list of notes with functionalities to add, select, and delete notes, and subscribes to note updates via external services.

classes.name: NotesList
classes.description: A Lightning Component that displays a list of notes, allowing users to add, select, and delete notes.

methods.name: $itemTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of a note item or 'Untitled' if absent.

methods.name: $itemUpdated
methods.description: Formats the note's updated timestamp into a locale string.

methods.name: $rowColor
methods.description: Determines the background color of a note row based on selection.

methods.name: $itemY
methods.description: Calculates the Y-position of a note item in the list.

methods.name: $trashColor
methods.description: Returns the hover-colored trash icon background if hovered.

methods.name: $onTrashHover
methods.description: Handles hover state over trash icons.

methods.name: $onTrashLeave
methods.description: Resets hover states when mouse leaves trash icons.

methods.name: $onAddHover
methods.description: Handles hover state for the add button.

methods.name: $onAddLeave
methods.description: Resets hover state for the add button.

methods.name: $emitSelect
methods.description: Updates selectedId and emits selection event.

methods.name: $select
methods.description: Triggers emitting of selected note id.

methods.name: $handleNew
methods.description: Creates a new note and selects it.

methods.name: $remove
methods.description: Removes a note after user confirmation within a brief timeout.
